title: Make Message icons optional
Upload 上传文件控件，如何增加其他项？
body:
- [x] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

### What problem does this feature solve?
**增加对上传文件的一些其他属性选择；**

例如：我上传的一个文档附件，需要指定当前该附件的密级为机密；那我怎么在已经上传的列表中，增添密级这个select，以满足我的需求。

**图片示例：**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31200868/37707748-30e5c758-2d3f-11e8-9104-0e19e7b42c37.png)


### What does the proposed API look like?
无

title: Timeline placing steps to left
body:
- [x] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

### What problem does this feature solve?
At the moment timeline only orders related items to the right side of the timeline point. That would be great if there was a option to place it to 'left' and 'right'

### What does the proposed API look like?
props:
{
position: 'left' | 'right'
}

title: <Tag> Render error after close tags
body:
- [ ] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

### Version
3.3.1

### Environment
Win10, chrome , React 15.4

### Reproduction link
[https://ant.design/components/tag-cn/](https://ant.design/components/tag-cn/)

### Steps to reproduce
1,Collect a list A containing 10 objects.
2, Render Tags from each object of A.
3, Splice the first object of A when call onClose.
4, Re-render  tags from A.

### What is expected?
When onClose is called, one element of the list is removed and the re-render  should be 9 Tags shown.

### What is actually happening?
The first and the second Tag is deleted from DOM, but list A is still contains 9 objects.


<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: table组件多页的情况下rowSelection中onChange的回调参数问题
body:
- [ ] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

### Version
3.3.1

### Environment
chrome

### Reproduction link
[http://ant-design.gitee.io/components/table-cn/#header](http://ant-design.gitee.io/components/table-cn/#header)

### Steps to reproduce
使用table组件，如果有多页。选中第一页的某条记录，再选择第二页的某条记录。rowSelection中onChange的回调参数selectedRows只有第二页选中的一条记录，没有之前第一页选择的记录

### What is expected?
有选中的所有记录，而不是只有当前页选中的row

### What is actually happening?
只有当前页选中的row


<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Select with search at the bottom of the page, renders the filtered list in the wrong position
body:
- [x] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

### Version
3.3.0

### Environment
ubuntu 17.10, firefox 59.0.1 (64-bit), react 16.2

### Reproduction link
[![Edit on CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/static/img/play-codesandbox.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/y3oq1ym1r9)

### Steps to reproduce
render a Select with showSearch flag at the bottom of a page - the last element in the page, so that the Select opens upwards - and search so that one or no results should show. 

### What is expected?
the popup list should be attached to the Select element

### What is actually happening?
the popup list maintains it's top position, and the result is that it's floating high above the Select element


<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Default value of optionLabelProp for Select component in manual do not match: "children" in manual, "value" in code
body:
- [ ] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

### Version
3.3.1

### Environment
any

### Reproduction link
[https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/a1d1ca4dc68cb12a6e4c5aaba5ccb70760d31e01/components/select/index.tsx#L143](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/a1d1ca4dc68cb12a6e4c5aaba5ccb70760d31e01/components/select/index.tsx#L143)

### Steps to reproduce
Check manual and source:
Link to manual: https://ant.design/components/select/
Link to source: https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/a1d1ca4dc68cb12a6e4c5aaba5ccb70760d31e01/components/select/index.tsx#L143

### What is expected?
Manual should match source.

### What is actually happening?
Default value of "optionLabelProp" for select component in manual is "children", but in source it is "value".

Popover to appear.

### What is actually happening?
Because it's located in a shadow DOM it doesn't work.

title: support compared
body:
First of all, thank you for your contribution! :-)

Please makes sure that these checkboxes are checked before submitting your PR, thank you!

* [ ] Make sure that you propose PR to right branch: bugfix for `master`, feature for latest active branch `feature-x.x`.
* [ ] Make sure that you follow antd's [code convention](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/wiki/Code-convention-for-antd).
* [ ] Run `npm run lint` and fix those errors before submitting in order to keep consistent code style.
* [ ] Rebase before creating a PR to keep commit history clear.
* [ ] Add some descriptions and refer relative issues for you PR.

Extra checklist:

**if** *isBugFix* **:**

  * [ ] Make sure that you add at least one unit test for the bug which you had fixed.

**elif** *isNewFeature* **:**

  * [ ] Update API docs for the component.
  * [ ] Update/Add demo to demonstrate new feature.
  * [ ] Update TypeScript definition for the component.
  * [ ] Add unit tests for the feature.

title: Layout.Sider does not support "style" prop (incorrect docs)
body:
### Version
3.3.0

### Environment
MacOS High Sierra, Firefox Quantum

### Reproduction link
[https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/a0e161ccddd0797bb6277f99471cdfd220ae3609/components/layout/Sider.tsx#L204-L210](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/a0e161ccddd0797bb6277f99471cdfd220ae3609/components/layout/Sider.tsx#L204-L210)

### Steps to reproduce
```
<Layout.Sider style={{ flex: "0 0 100%" }} />
```

### What is expected?
this.props.styles would take precedence over computed styles within Layout.Sider.

### What is actually happening?
Layout.Sider overrides explicit "style" prop

---
I was attempting to make a right Sider 50% width instead of an explicit value.

The documentation indicates that `style` is accepted, but doesn't indicate that in no way can you customize the computed values:
> https://ant.design/components/layout/#Layout.Sider

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: TreeSelect 组件属性treeNodeLabelProp
body:
### What problem does this feature solve?
treeNodeLabelProp这个属性值能放开吗?现在只能写'title'和'value'绑定了对应的值,我现在的需求是不管选了什么都是显示'请选择节点'之类的,总之就是放开--Sorry for my poor english.

### What does the proposed API look like?
```
<TreeSelect treeNodeLabelProp='请选择节点' />
```

title: Transfer component - **Not Found**display issue in Microsoft Edge
body:
### Version
3.3.0

### Environment
Windows 10, Microsoft Edge 40.15063.674.0

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/anon/pen/aYZZmM?editors=001](https://codepen.io/anon/pen/aYZZmM?editors=001)

### Steps to reproduce
Please sorry for my not perfect english.

First bug:
1. Input something in search, which doesn't match with any item (like `abc`, `haha` etc) and don`t click anywhere, let the field be focused.
1. Have a look, that **Not Found** is not present, until you unfocused the search field.

Second bug:
1. Reproduce step 1 in previous bug
2. Unfocus search field, so **Not Found** appears.
3. Delete text, which you input in search field
4. Have a look, that **Not Found** is still present.

### What is expected?
First bug:
- expected **Not Found** to be shown immediately, when list is empty

Second bug:
- expected **Not Found** not to be shown, after list have at least one item

### What is actually happening?
First bug:
- **Not Found** doesn't appear

Second bug:
- **Not Found** doesn't disappear

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: Add Anchor[getContainer]
body:
The original `Anchor[target]` is not documented and not functional. Renamed it to `getContainer` to make it more consistent with semantics.

Also fixes #9358

title: Progress type circle no animation when percentage changes from 0
body:
### Version
3.3.0

### Environment
All browsers, only tested on macOS

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/3y70vqyyv6](https://codesandbox.io/s/3y70vqyyv6)

### Steps to reproduce
1. Create a Progress component with type 'circle' and percentage 0
2. Change percentage from 0 to a different value (for example 100)

### What is expected?
It is expected to show an animation. It does show an animation when the percentage changes from 1 to for example 100. It does not show an animation when the percentage changes from 0 to 100. This looks laggy.

### What is actually happening?
No animation is shown, and after about a second the circle will fill the bar.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

title: When I reset treeData, the TreeSelect will still record my previous development.
body:
### Version
3.0.0

### Environment
Chrome 64.0.3282.186

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/dingwufu/pen/wmMYaM?editors=0010](https://codepen.io/dingwufu/pen/wmMYaM?editors=0010)

### Steps to reproduce
1. Load data, expand an item to load data asynchronously.
2.Switching another Select allows the TreeSelect data to be the new treeData.
3.Continue to switch back to the original value via Select, and click to view the TreeSelect.

### What is expected?
I hope that some operations will clear the expandkys of the TreeSelect. And the TreeSelect will not record the expansion of the original data, and the icon will not point downward.

### What is actually happening?
The data item icon previously expanded in the TreeSelect will be pointing downwards

---
The data using the TreeSelect relies on an external property value, and the state in the TreeSelect is initialized when the property value is modified.

<!-- generated by ant-design-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

body:
水平菜单中菜单项内有链接，点击菜单项底部无效，因为绝对定位相对的是菜单项的 padding-box，但菜单项存在 2px 的 border-bottom
